title: Accidently removed cordova platform ios folder [duplicate]
content:
I was trying to uninstall a plugin but accidently ran the command cordova platform remove ios and it removed the app code on my macbook. 

I don't see anything in trash as well. Is there any way to get the code back by reverse engineering on the ipa file?

Please help.

comments.text: I'm voting to close this question as off-topic because it is not about reverse-engineering.
@perror i clearly mentioned in the question that i lost the files. I asked that can we do reverse engineering to get the code back
Reverse-engineering what ? The file-system ? What you need is to recover erased files, it has nothing to do with reverse-engineering.
reverse engineering on the ipa file
